title: Saudi Arabia Says Hajj Will Be Limited To 60000 People, All From Within The Kingdom
content:
1. Saudi Arabia Says Hajj Will Be Limited To 60000 People, All From Within The Kingdom  NPR
  2. Saudi Arabia bars foreign pilgrims from Hajj due to COVID  Al Jazeera English
  3. Covid-19: Saudi Arabia to allow 60000 vaccinated residents to attend Hajj  Middle East Eye
  4. 60000 vaccinated pilgrims residing in Saudi Arabia can perform Hajj this year  Saudi Gazette
  5. Saudi Arabia bars foreign travellers from Haj over COVID-19  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
